text: Mubateekenga ku ba kitaabwe, ekyo kye kituufu ewa Katonda, bwe muba temumanyi ba kitaabwe (mu bayite baganda ba mmwe) anti baganda ba mmwe mu ddiini, era bannammwe (mu ddiini) era temulina kibi mu ekyo kye mukola mu butanwa, naye (ekibavunaanwa) kyekyo emitima gya mmwe gye kiba gikoze mu bugenderevu, era bulijjo Katonda musonyiyi nnyo musaasizi
